articles.content: The latest haul of new releases and ports is on its way to Xbox Game Pass and theres a bunch of really good stuff. While sci-fi shooter Deathloop finally joins the console service after a year of PS5… [+3101 chars]

articles.title: In Rust We Trust: Microsoft Azure CTO shuns C and C++ - The Register
articles.description: Mark Russinovich goes hardcore against old languages
articles.content:
Updated Microsoft Azure CTO Mark Russinovich has had it with C and C++, time-tested programming languages commonly used for native applications that require high performance.
On Monday, Russinovich … [+5742 chars]
